mapper.update: update partner_contract_templates set platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created = #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select template_id, platform_id, created, updated, is_deleted, content from partner_contract_templates
